# 第三周作业

## 3.1 女生血清蛋白分析

读入数据
```{r}
w <- as.vector(unlist(read.table("exec0301.data"))); w
```

计算均值(mean)、方差标准差(std_dev)、极差(R)、标准误(sm)、变异系数(cv)、偏度(Skewness)、峰度(Kurtosis)。
```{r}
source("../R-Book-Demo/ch3/data_outline.R", echo=TRUE, max.deparse.length=3e3)
data_outline(w)
```

## 3.2

直方图 密度线
```{r}
hist(w,col="blue",freq=F)
lines(density(w),col="red")
```

经验分布
```{r}
plot(ecdf(w),verticals=T,do.p=F)
lines(w,pnorm(w,mean(w),sd(w),log.p=F))
qqnorm(w)
qqline(w)
```

3.3茎叶图 箱线图 五位总括
```{r}
stem(w, scale=1)
boxplot(w,outline=F)
fivenum(w,na.rm=F)
```

3.4
```{r}
shapiro.test(w)

ks.test(w,"pnorm",mean(w),sd(w))
```

3.9
```{r}
height=c(56.5, 65.3, 64.3, 56.3, 59.8,     66.5, 51.3, 62.5, 62.8, 69.0,            63.5, 67.0, 57.3, 62.5, 59.0,            72.0, 64.8, 57.5, 66.5)
weight=c(84.0, 98.0, 90.0, 77.0, 84.5,     112.0, 50.5, 112.5, 102.5, 112.5,    102.5, 133.0, 83.0, 84.0, 99.5,     150.0, 128.0, 85.0, 112.0)
cor.test(height,weight,methods = "Pearson")
```
p-value = 7.887e-07 <0.05 所以相关
